text: Raphael Obermair (born 1 April 1996) is a German-Filipino professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for 1. FC Magdeburg. ==Career== ===Youth=== Obermair was born in Prien am Chiemsee, Bavaria, He had his youth at TSV 1860 Rosenheim. ===TSV 1860 Rosenheim=== In 2014, Obermair was promoted to the first team of TSV 1860 Rosenheim. He made a total of 84 games scoring 4 goals in his two-year spell with the senior team. ===Bayern Munich II=== In 2016, Obermair joined the second team of Bundesliga club Bayern Munich. ===Sturm Graz=== In 2018, Obermair signed a two-year deal with Austrian Bundesliga club Sturm Graz. ===Carl Zeiss Jena=== On 7 August 2019, Obermair joined Carl Zeiss Jena. ==International career== Obermair was born and raised in Prien am Chiemsee, Germany to a German father and a Filipino mother, making him eligible to represent either Germany or the Philippines at international level. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rosenheim (district) Category:Association football midfielders Category:German footballers Category:TSV 1860 Rosenheim players Category:SK Sturm Graz players Category:FC Bayern Munich II players Category:FC Bayern Munich footballers Category:FC Carl Zeiss Jena players Category:1. FC Magdeburg players Category:Regionalliga players Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga players Category:German people of Filipino descent Category:Footballers from Bavaria Category:3. Liga players
title: Raphael Obermair
